reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions collecting data such as name, email address, website details for comment form, cookies for site convenience, and temporary cookies for login details.
reply.reference: If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser. When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. When you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed. URL: https://www.healingmind.com.au/privacy-policy/

may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app may collect data such as name, email address, website for comments, IP address, browser user agent string, and login information.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section that describes the collection of data when users leave comments or visit the login page on the app.
reply.reference: Name, Email address, and Website for comments. IP address and Browser user agent string. Login information. URL: https://www.healingmind.com.au/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use by mentioning that the information provided by users is used to improve its website and services while not being used for any other purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the information provided by users is utilized to enhance the website and services, demonstrating the app's declaration of the purpose of data collection and use.
reply.reference: We may use the information that you provide to improve its website and its services but not for any other use. URL: https://www.healingmind.com.au/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection by not opting in to save personal information in cookies. Additionally, users can request to receive an exported file of the personal data held about them and request erasure of any personal data held, except under obligations for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out of data collection by not opting in to save personal information in cookies. Additionally, users have the right to request the deletion of personal data held about them, except where certain obligations require the retention of data.
reply.reference: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes. URL: https://www.healingmind.com.au/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: HealingMind©, EnergySym©, World of Health©, Return To Wellness Clinic© and its founders/associates do not sell or deal in personal or customer information. The app may use provided information for marketing statistics, identifying user demands, and improving website services.

content: Return To Wellness Clinic© and its founders/associates
